messages.subject: [samuraihistory] Assistance requested
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I would like to know if there is anyone in or around Murayama-shi Yamagataken.  If anyone is, please contact me off list.  I have a request
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all,

I would like to know if there is anyone in or around Murayama-shi
Yamagataken. If anyone is, please contact me off list. I have a request
regarding the Hayashizaki shrine there.


Peace,

Matt Williams

Attorney General: Florida Gulf Coast University - Student Government
Association

History Columnist: Zap Fort Myers On-Line Magazine -
http://www.zapfortmyers.com/mag/show.cgi
